ygData.subject: Re: Different Plains
ygData.msgSnippet: I thought there was a plane of the dead also? Anyone please. confirm if true. Thank ... From: Chad Eldridge  To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
I thought there was a plane of the dead also?
Anyone please. confirm if true.
Thank
-----Original Message-----
From: Chad Eldridge <chad@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 9:49 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Different Plains


Yes there are 2 different planes besides the normal one. Hate and Sky (or air). The spells are Alter Plane: Hate and Alter Plane: Sky. They are both lvl 44 spells. I have a friend who traveled there. He said there are liches on the hate plane. Personally i cant wait to get to go there but are there only certain places from which you can cast these spells? This i do no know he didnt say, but from the way you were talking there is.
